StatusIdle.description: The text displayed when microphone is not listening.

StatusListening.description: The text displayed when microphone is listening for input.

ErrNoSoundDetected.description: This text is displayed when the microphone does not detect any speech.

ErrNoSpeechDetected.description: This text is displayed when the microphone does not detect any speech.

ErrNoAudioCapture.message: Netika konstatēta neviena mikrofona ierīce vai mikrofons ir izslēgts.
ErrNoAudioCapture.description: The extension is unable to detect any connected microphone, also happens when mic is muted.

ErrPermissionNotGranted.message: Nevar piekļūt mikrofonam, atļauja nav piešķirta
ErrPermissionNotGranted.description: The user has not granted microphone permission

ErrLangNotSupported.description: The user's selected locale is not supported.

QsGoBack.description: Text on button used to navigate backwards

QsSpeechLanguage.description: Label for the drop-down to select user speech language.

QsSearchEngine.description: Label for drop-down to select search engine.

QsMicrophone.description: Label for drop-down to select microphone to use.

QsLaunchTarget.description: Label for drop-down to select launch target.

QsLaunchNewTab.description: Option to open URLs in new tab.

QsLaunchCurrentTab.description: Option to open URLs in current tab.

QsCannotChangeMic.message: Mikrofona izvēle pārlūkprogrammas atpazīšanai nav pieejama.
QsCannotChangeMic.description: Error message for mic selection not available.

QsNoDefaultInput.description: Message displayed when there's no input device.

AppDetailDescription.message:
Audate nodrošina balss pārsūtīšanas iespējas pārlūkošanas pieredzei.

Meklējiet tīmeklī, izmantojot balsi, noklikšķinot uz pārlūkprogrammas ikonas.

Runājiet savā dabiskajā valodā un ļaujiet uzlabotajiem AI un ML modeļiem pārvērst tos tekstā. Tiek atbalstītas 300 lokalizācijas visā pasaulē!

Izvēlieties kādu no populārākajām meklētājprogrammām, piemēram, Google un Bing.

Tas ir atvērts avots un publicēts vietnē https: //github.com/AudateApp.
AppDetailDescription.description: Detailed description displayed on extension page.
